interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gel Nail Polish Set - TOEDO Fall Winter Nail Gel 6 Colors Tan Brown Colors Soak Off LED Nail Lamp Gel Polish Kit for Home DIY Manicure Nail Designs
Review Date: 2021/03/08
Store: TOEDO
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'TOEDO', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Glossy', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.56 FL Oz', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '11.1 x 3.31 x 3.23 inches; 9.14 Ounces'}
Review Text: Pretty colors but the polish was very thick.  It’s difficult to apply.  Probably personal preference but I’d like it a little thinner so that it distributes/applies easier.
Review Title: Consistency too thick
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

Nice set.  Colors look great.  One very big con was the top coat.  It just didn’t seem to want to dry and took way longer than other dip sets that I have. Needless to say I touched it and ruined the clean look.  I will be using a gel top coat with this going forward.
Pretty colors

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Enjoys high-pigmentation gel nail polishes with a diverse color palette; recently enhanced exploration includes bath accessories for relaxation, skincare products focusing on hydration, and effective pet grooming tools to improve pet care routines.

- **Color Selection:** Favors neutral tones like grey and ivory while also appreciating vibrant colors in nail products. 

- **Product Quality:** Values high-quality products with a keen eye on consistency; recent interactions indicate dissatisfaction with product thickness impacting application ease, leading to a lower rating. This reflects a strong emphasis on performance and quality control.

- **Ethical Considerations:** Commits to cruelty-free and non-toxic products, showing environmental consciousness in beauty and personal care choices.

- **Rating Expectation:** Typically rates products moderately to positively, but performance and quality issues notably influence ratings. The latest experience demonstrates a critical view of product application, impacting overall satisfaction.

- **Gift Potential:** Prefers thoughtfully packaged items, leaning towards gift sets that reflect quality and aesthetic appeal.

- **Lifestyle Preferences:** Prioritizes products that enhance comfort and support personal routines, valuing functionality, design, and effective results while seeking reliable and enjoyable experiences for relaxation and self-care. 

The user's recent experience with nail polish illustrates a growing expectation for product performance, specifically regarding texture and usability, aligning with their high standards for quality in personal care items.
